title: Strengthening Learning Design Practical Competencies: Education on Identifying Trend Relationships Through Visual Image Utilization

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can define and explain transitive relations
Learners can visually analyze transitive relations using directed graphs (digraphs)
Learners can apply transitive relation concepts to real-world cases (medical diagnostic protocols, legal clause systems, etc.) to design relational networks

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
